attributes.action: Create a mechanism whereby MPs who abuse the public trust and confidence can be impeached and removed from office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently if an MP abuses the trust of constituents or acts in a manner that is fraudulent, unethical or even criminal there is no mechanism that permits that MP to be recalled or sacked by his or her constituency.  Simply we ask that this should be changed.

We do not suggest a system that is open to Party Political abuse, measures could easily be put in place that would allow the party currently holding the constituency to select an agreeable alternative, but MPs who either take money from the Public Purse without just cause or from Individuals and Corporate Sponsors whose interests may not be coterminus with those the MP's constituents should face the loss of their employment in the same way that any public servant might

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
